name: Dana Rukse
text: Great service and good pizza. Was nice to sit down and enjoy it.

name: Chris Willard
text: We are on vacation out of WV.  The fishing trip was a bust but friendly hospitality and service with a smile was a warm welcome at Pizza Hut.  The food was excellent!

name: Stacey Kemphfer
text: Polite waitresses and good food. Dine in or carry out

name: Zachary Slaubaugh
text: Pizza is pizza, you can’t go wrong. I definitely prefer the sauce on theirs tho!

text: Had to wait just a little while but they were apologetic and the pizza was hot and delicious.

name: Rachel Dowling
text: Try the cinnamon sticks!

name: The Spanish Brad Pitt
text: Service was good. I'm extremely disappointed though that Pizza Hut has decided to void cheese as a topping as I was explained and decides to charge an extra $2.00 for any extra cheese. If the cheese is on top of the pizza it's a topping …More

text: I love the food and the service is always wonderful.

name: Robert Garlitz
text: I ordered online and it took 40 minutes to get my order. Standing there watching the cooks and none of them wore gloves to put on the toppings or hair nets on their big beards. I have a big beard and I know what comes out of it. That's disgusting.

text: Always prompt and ordering online is easy. Also great they allow you to add location only items to your online order easily with a call.
